mapper.select: SELECT id, telphone, name, gender, estate, address, url, phase, info, DATE_FORMAT(created_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS createdTime, DATE_FORMAT(updated_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS updatedTime, created_by AS createdBy, updated_by AS updatedBy FROM t_customer_info WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY updated_time DESC LIMIT #{item.pageSize} OFFSET #{item.pageNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_customer_info (telphone, name, gender, estate, address, url, phase, info, updated_time, updated_by, created_time, created_by) VALUES (#{item.telphone}, #{item.name}, #{item.gender}, #{item.estate}, #{item.address}, #{item.url}, #{item.phase}, #{item.info}, now(), 0, now(), 0)
